'''''Other Minds'' 16''' is the sixteenth issue of ''[[Other Minds]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' and other role playing games set in Middle-earth, published in September 2016.

==Contents==
* "Editorial"
** By [[Thomas Morwinsky]]
* "The Road Goes Ever On"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Inside Information"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Middle-earth in miniature II: Dwarves"
** By José Enrique Vacas de la Rosa
* "Review: Tales from Wilderland"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Review: Heart of the Wild"
** By José Enrique Vacas de la Rosa
* "Umbar, Khand & Near Harad - Cultural Gazetteer"
** By Tom Davie
* "The Population of Gondor and Rohan"
** By: Thomas Morwinsky
* "Appendix" (Full-scale maps for ''The Population of Gondor and Rohan'')
